overview: As an infant, Ruth Drake was stolen from her father by her vengeful mother, and then abandoned. She was adopted and raised by a pawnbroker, and as a young woman joins the Salvation Army in order to help the kinds of people she has seen--and was--growing up. When war breaks out in Europe, she volunteers to go to France
tagline: A THOUSAND TORN SOULS AND THE GIRL WHO SHOWED THEM THE LIGHT.
title: The Blue Bonnet
